Greetings Community. 

At present we are working with windows 2000 terminal server, like the web server
apache 1.3.33. and php 4.3.11.  We are observing that our server apache is
suffering fallen constantly and many times remains zombi remaining blocked
without possibility of raising some page.  We have revised all the posibilities
and not yet we have been able to resolve the problem.  

Some we think to the incompatibility of apache with Windows 2000 and others with
php.  

I expect they can help me.  Thanks.
creator: agner.g@gmail.com

text:
Actually, this is more likely a problem with Terminal Server and the old
  Apache.  I would be very interested to know if you installed Apache 2.0,
  are these resolved?

  Terminal Server changes the way that global objects are named, and for
  some PHP modules this may cause a problem, for Apache 2.0 it certainly
  did, so we rewrote a number of pieces of the APR (Apache Portability
  Runtime) to handle these discrepancies.
creator: wrowe@apache.org

Using an eight year old server on a five year old platform is a pretty
crufty combination.

If you have issues on Apache 2.2 using terminal server flavor of Windows
we are most interested in investigating, please open new bugs.
